answers.answer: diabetics should have blood sugar between 70-100 closer to 80-90.  either she isn't taking her medication correctly or she is cheating by eating candy or something else sugary.  is she young?  i know its hard for a lot of kids to stay on their insulin and eating correctly.  if she can't get it under control talk to her endocrinologist.  its important she be honest about what she's eating.
She was dxed as emerging diabetes  she is three years old  and has no pure sugar in her diet at  all  new diagnosis...  just confusing is she or isn't she diabetic...  just a hard waiting game..

question: Grandaughter has had two episodes of "stress induced high blood sugars"  Now has had a third episode with ketones  and sugar in urine and bs of 245 finger stick on waking.  throughout the day she has hovered around 145 with trace ketones in urine...  Tonight she is down to 68 cbg and is acting normal??  any thoughts...
title: Juvinile diabetes
